column1: Smoque BBQ////Make sure you call and order ahead of time so you only need to pickup when you are there. Waiting for your food to get ready when you're hungry is no fun! At home we found out that they left out one whole slab of bbq that should've been included in the bag. Good thing they have great customer service so they had it delivered to our house free of charge. It was just the waiting part that's frustrating. Still
